features: Oat is the first ingredient in this scalp-soothing, hydrating, farm-fresh inspired conditioner infused with almond milk makes achieving enviable soft, moisturized hair easy

Blended to lightly nourish and soften strands from root to tip, these farm-to-shower fresh ingredients work together to help promote a healthy scalp environment while enhancing your hair's natural beauty
Sulfate free conditioner, free from dyes and parabens, making it safe for all hair types including color treated hair
We are inspired by nature; our oat is sourced from a small town mill where pride and quality go hand and hand and we do not test our products on animals

Aveeno is a trusted household brand established in 1945 and is best known for its line of skin soothing products, where oat's natural soothing properties are put to work in body, face and scalp applications
body.description: We believe that beautiful hair starts at the root. Soothe your scalp and rebalance the moisture in your hair daily with this farm-to-shower inspired Oat Milk Blend Conditioner. Oat as the first ingredient helps to promote a healthy scalp environment for all hair types. Infused with almond milk, achieve lightweight nourishment, softened strands and all day hydration. The blend of ingredients works to produce a sensational, fresh fragrance. Free from sulfates, parabens and dyes, this product is safe for color-treated hair. We source our oats from a quiet mill located along the rolling hills of the Mississippi River Valley, in a small town where pride and quality go hand-in-hand. We love the way we feel when everything is in balance. That's why we start with oat as the first ingredient. Each blend helps to soothe your scalp and nourish your strands from root to tip. Discover blends made with simple ingredients, from simpler times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dandruff-Fighting Ninja with a Luxe Twist
reviews.reviewText: When it comes to hair care, finding the perfect shampoo that not only tackles specific concerns but also leaves your hair looking and smelling divine can be quite a challenge. The Aveeno Farm-Fresh Oat Milk Sulfate-Free Shampoo is a true gem in this regard. Allow me to share my experience with this product.I have eczema, not severe or anything but I was always fighting those stubborn flakes. The effectiveness of this shampoo in minimizing dandruff is truly impressive. If you've struggled with this pesky problem, you know how frustrating it can be. The Aveeno formula, enriched with farm-fresh oat milk, works wonders in soothing the scalp and reducing dandruff. It's gentle yet effective, offering relief without over-drying your hair or scalp.Now, let's talk about the fragrance. This shampoo not only cleanses your hair but also treats your senses to a delightful, fresh scent that lingers long after you've stepped out of the shower. It's like a mini aromatherapy session every time you wash your hair. The scent is subtle, not overpowering, making it a pleasant addition to your daily routine.Beyond dandruff control and fragrance, this shampoo delivers on the promise of making your hair look shiny and smooth. With regular use, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and appearance of my hair. It felt softer, looked healthier, and had a beautiful shine.Also, the sulfate-free formula is gentle on your hair, ensuring that it doesn't strip away essential oils or cause unnecessary damage. This is particularly important if you have color-treated hair or sensitive skin.This shampoo has become a staple in my hair care routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a solution for dandruff concerns while enjoying a pampering experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing. I don't normally enjoy the cleaner smells because I like sweet smelling things- but this stuff smells like sweet lavender! It also makes my hair silky smooth with little to no frizz. Not as scalp soothing as advertised which is why I got it- but has amazing qualities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars So so conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased these Aveeno products for the first time, because I’m trying to stay away from some chemicals that supposedly make your hair fall out. I like how the shampoo works, but the conditioner seems to leave my hair, stringy and frizzy.

reviews.reviewText: Smells great, makes my hair soft, helps my inflamed itchy scalp. I even use it on my toddler.

reviews.reviewText: My friend bought this shampoo and conditioner at the store. I tried it. I loved it. I found it on Amazon, it was cheaper. Now every friend of mine uses it

Si tienes cabello largo y se te hacen nudos constantemente, esta es la solución. Tiene una consistencia muy espesa y cremosa, y un olor rico pero suave, que hace que el cabello se desenrede casi solo y quede con una apariencia muy hidratada.
Very good what I was looking for great value and moisturizer my skin
